headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Tired of your daily driver? It might be time to spice things up with a little variety — luckily, there are deals on several vehicles of assorted classes. It’s a smorgasbord of savings, including:

- Ocelot Pariah – 30% off
- Coil Raiden – 30% off
- Karin Everon – 40% off
- BF Club – 40% off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
